EmailTemplate.subject: Your new DealChicken Merchant Portal account!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
I have set you up with an account so you can pull the certificate report whenever you would like, as well as to view individual certificates, etc.
I sent a password reset request to __________ so you can create a new password.
To utilize this merchant feature, please follow these steps:
1. Visit www.DealChicken.com 2. In the top right-hand corner, click ‘Sign In’ 3. Place your cursor below ‘My Deals’ and a drop-down box will appear 4. Select ‘Vendor’ 5. This will take you to the merchant portal where you can view deals, certificates, and pull reports
I have also attached a document that details this process.
The second document is our merchant redemption tool one-sheeter. This details how you can redeem used vouchers, track new customers, and calculate various other statistics.
If you have any questions on this, feel free to reach out to me.
